[DQR.IFRS.0102.9542] Equity with a value of 15,475,000,000 is not equal to the combined total of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI and Noncontrolling Interest ( 12,843,000,000 + 1,010,000,000 ) with a value of 13,853,000,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:Equity fact are: Period :2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Stockholders Equity Including Noncontrolling Interest : -6 Decimals of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI : -6 Decimals of Noncontrolling Interest : -6

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 02 - Income statement but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:DividendsPaidOtherShares, ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToOrdinaryEquityHoldersOfParentEntity All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0130.9725] The calculated earnings or loss per share does not equal the actual value reported for the concept BasicEarningsLossPerShare for the period 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31. The value reported is 2.22. The calculated value is calculated by dividing the concept ProfitLossAttributableToOrdinaryEquityHoldersOfParentEntity with a value of 729,000,000 by the denominator WeightedAverageShares with a value of 329,000. This equals 2,215.8055 (rounded 4d) which differs from the reported value of 2.22. Please check that the calculation is correct or that the correct elements have been used.
Element : BasicEarningsLossPerShare Period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : 2 Unit : EUR/shares
Rule Element Id:9725 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/9ZHRYM6F437SQJ6OUG95/2021-12-31/ESEF/AT/0/RBI-2021-12-31-en.zip/RBI-2021-12-31-en/reports/RBI-2021-12-31-en.xhtml 59507
